title: Whales: Some Image Processing
description: MotivationBased on my previous analysis, it's apparent that we have a severe imbalanced classes problem. Thus, I think we need to spend some time applying transformations to observations in the smaller classes in order to create a more balanced dataset for fitting. Find small classLet's find an extremely small class to work with, perhaps one with just one image.
